c74object.name: windowed-fft~
c74object.description: windowed-fft~ is an abstraction wrapping a pair of fft~ objects and performing the necessary windowing and overlap to use the output for analysis.

objarg.name: number-of-FFT-samples
objarg.description: The first argument specifies the number of points (samples) in the FFT. It must be a power of two. If you are unsure, use 1024.

method.name: signal
method.description: Audio signal to be transformed from the time domain into the frequency domain.
